pronunciation.pinyin: bá chū luó bo dài chū ní
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: ba2 chu1 luo2 bo5 dai4 chu1 ni2

meanings.value: when you pull a radish out of the ground, some dirt comes up with it
fig. to uncover, during the investigation of a crime, evidence of other crimes
to cause further problems while working on a problem
